summary_one_paragraph: This collection of documents pertains to Lee H. Wigren's career within the CIA from 1950 to 1978, encompassing personnel actions such as reassignments and a promotion within the DDO/CI Staff's Research and Analysis Group, alongside delegation of NSCA authority. It also includes a memorandum from B. DeFelice, Acting Director of Personnel, outlining retirement planning services offered by the Agency, like pre-retirement counseling and information seminars, intended to facilitate Wigren's transition to retirement.
